column2: Icahn Enterprises LP operates as holding company. The company is headquartered in New York City, New York and currently employs 29,000 full-time employees. The firm's segments include Automotive, Energy, Metals, Food Packaging, Mining, Real Estate and Home Fashion. The firm's Investment segment includes various private investment funds. The firm operates its Automotive segment through its ownership in IEH Auto Parts Holding LLC. The firm operates Energy segment through its controlling interest in CVR Energy, Inc. The company operates its Metals segment through its subsidiary, PSC Metals, Inc. Its Food Packaging segment consists of ownership in Viskase Companies, Inc. The firm's Real Estate operations consist of rental real estate, property development and associated resorts. The company also owns a limited partner interest in Icahn Enterprises Holdings L.P. (Icahn Enterprises Holdings).
